meanings.definition: The pursuit of a career or advancement in one's profession.
meanings.sent1: Her careerism led her to apply for every job opening in the company.
meanings.sent2: Careerism is important for those who want to climb the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent3: His extreme careerism even made his pet dog apply for a job.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of careerism, only the strongest survive.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of careerism blinded her to other opportunities.

meanings.definition: The practice of prioritizing one's career over other aspects of life.
meanings.sent1: She missed her friend's wedding due to her careerism.
meanings.sent2: Careerism can sometimes lead to neglecting personal relationships.
meanings.sent3: His careerism was so intense that he scheduled his birthday party during a work meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the race of careerism, don't forget to enjoy the scenery along the way.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of careerism loomed over his family gatherings.
